title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 442.3 - Payment of bills
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 442.3 - Payment of bills

State Regulations
(a) Bills for durable medical equipment, medical/surgical supply, or orthotic or
prosthetic appliance shall be paid in accordance with the fee schedule
established by section
442.2
of this Part and section
13-g
of the Workers' Compensation Law. Objections to and resolution of billing
disputes shall be in the format and according to the process prescribed by the

Chair and as set forth in section
13-g
of the Workers' Compensation Law and section
325-1.25
of Part 325 of this

Chapter. Effective date. This regulation shall be effective on

January 1, 2020. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
442.3

Amended

New

York State Register January 29, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 04, eff. 1/29/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
